name: Faith of Fate
description:
Faith of Fate is an Δdventure Indie game that presents a strory in a world ruled by Cupid, where you'll find many personalities in your road, taking a piece of them with you, becoming stronger and fighting aganist the reflection of your own faith. Yo have the fate in your hands, what will you do? Heaven or Hell?

Content
  • Random levels each time you play
  • Lovely characters who want to kill you
  • Random items with even more random effects
  • You are important to me <3
  • Secret Lore
